Title: Valiant
Writer: George Webster (story), Jordan Katz (screenplay), George Webster (screenplay), George Melrod (screenplay)
Actors: Ewan McGregor, Ricky Gervais, Tim Curry, Jim Broadbent
Plot: At the height of World War II, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is he a war-hero in the making?
